query:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.slug, 
       CASE WHEN p.mainText IS NULL THEN 'NULL' 
            WHEN LENGTH(p.mainText) = 0 THEN 'EMPTY' 
            ELSE CONCAT(LENGTH(p.mainText), ' chars') 
       END as mainText_status
FROM pages p
WHERE p.slug = 'conceito-de-porcentagem';
